content.div:
Jennifer Aniston would like everyone to know that she didn't pull an Angelina Jolie and hook up with her married costar on the set of her new movie, Wanderlust.

"Nothing happened on that movie ... it's a rumor," she said of the whispers that she had hooked up with current boyfriend and Wanderlust costar Theroux while he was still married. "It's the easy rumor, but nothing happened. We were just friends. I’ve known Justin for a long time."

When asked to describe Theroux, Aniston joked, "He's the most cold, icy, fishy kind of a guy. I'm trying to warm him up, but you know," before calling him "cute" and "a great actor."

She also described her perfect day without the paparazzi, "This day's not long enough. I'd go shopping, I'd go to the museums, I'd go to the movies, I'd go to dinner. I'd do everything you could squeeze into a day."

But Aniston insists she’s found ways to deal with her highly scrutinized life. "I've gotten to a place where we know how to maneuver around (the paparazzi) a little bit more. I've laid on many a floorboard (in cars)."

Watch Aniston’s appearance on Good Morning America below:
